extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
1BG, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

T: Add 1 to your mana pool.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: Niv-Mizzet's genius and vanity reverberate throughout the mirrored halls of Nivix.

Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.

extendedData.name: FlavorText

extendedData.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
